messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Questioning doctors Jodye
messages.msgSnippet: Jodye, I think that everyone who read your post learned from it.  And you should not blame yourself or feel guilty- not only are those emotions a waste of
messages.messageBody:
Jodye,
I think that everyone who read your post learned from it. And you should
not blame yourself or feel guilty- not only are those emotions a waste of
time, but you must remember: When we know better, we do better. I believe we
all come to this planet to help each other and each one of us has a special
purpose. Maybe your beautiful daughter chose to come here to help you grow
and become stronger as a mother and a woman! She is definitely an incredible
gift and I bet she has already taught you a lot. Now you are sharing the
things you have learned and experienced with others! Thank-you to you and
your child... Jackie
